name: Banana Bread
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Mix together flour, baking soda, and salt. Cream together butter and brown sugar. Stir in eggs and mashed bananas. Gradually add flour mixture. Pour batter into prepared loaf pan. Bake for 60-65 minutes. Allow to cool.

name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. In a separate bowl, mix together buttermilk, milk, egg, and melted butter. Gradually add flour mixture. Heat a lightly oiled griddle over medium-high heat. Pour batter onto griddle. Cook until bubbles form and edges are dry. Flip and cook until browned.

name: Apple Pie
ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch double crust pie
8 Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and sliced
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Melt butter in a saucepan. Stir in flour, water, white sugar, and brown sugar. Bring to a boil. Reduce temperature and let simmer. Fill pie crust with apples. Cover with a lattice work crust. Pour sugar and butter liquid over the crust. Bake for 15 minutes. Reduce the temperature to 350°F (175°C) and continue baking for 35-45 minutes.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Wash and dry the lettuce. Tear into bite-sized pieces. Toss with Parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. Drain. In a large skillet, cook ground beef, onion, and garlic over medium heat until browned. Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, red wine, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes. Serve sauce over spaghetti. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
